Package org.spongycastle.crypto.signers

Basic signers.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DSADigestSigner  
    DSASigner
    The Digital Signature Algorithm - as described in "Handbook of Applied Cryptography", pages 452 - 453.
    ECDSASigner
    EC-DSA as described in X9.62
    ECGOST3410Signer
    GOST R 34.10-2001 Signature Algorithm
    ECNRSigner
    EC-NR as described in IEEE 1363-2000
    GenericSigner  
    GOST3410Signer
    GOST R 34.10-94 Signature Algorithm
    ISO9796d2PSSSigner
    ISO9796-2 - mechanism using a hash function with recovery (scheme 2 and 3).
    ISO9796d2Signer
    ISO9796-2 - mechanism using a hash function with recovery (scheme 1)
    NTRUSigner
    Signs, verifies data and generates key pairs.
    NTRUSignerPrng
    An implementation of the deterministic pseudo-random generator in EESS section 3.7.3.1
    PSSSigner
    RSA-PSS as described in PKCS# 1 v 2.1.
    RSADigestSigner  

Package org.spongycastle.crypto.signers Description
